attributes.action: Scrap the T.V licence and make the BBC self sufficient.
attributes.background: I believe the T.V licence needs to be scraped and the BBC needs to become a self sufficient service. They have waisted the people's money for long enough and the quality of programs continues to deteriorate.

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar to the one which you submitted:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129836

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123693
